Comprehensive regulatory and quality system audits

notes: Intertek is a global leader in cosmetics auditing and compliance services. They provide comprehensive regulatory audits, quality system audits, and supplier assessments for the beauty industry. As a full-service provider, Intertek can integrate auditing with their testing and certification services for end-to-end compliance solutions.
